conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall geometry and cutaway perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect dimensional transformation. Walls have consistent thickness and height; floor planes are distinct.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout fidelity. All rooms, including the service room and balconies, are correctly positioned. Minor simplification of window frames.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is very strong and mirrors the 2D plan closely (living set, dining, beds). Scaling is consistent.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, excellent lighting, and clear structural distinctions. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window openings compared to 2D architectural markings.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the complex geometric layout and furniture configuration of the original architectural plan.
